an5.116:1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
an5.116:1.5: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
an5.116:1.6: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
an5.116:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
an5.116:2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge.
an5.116:2.5: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
an5.116:2.6: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
an5.116:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge”ti.
